page.title: 08HIGHPARK FARM,STANMER.
page.content: We visited Highpark Farm on 13th June 1985 and met one of the tenants on the farm. The Brighton Corporation owns{300 acres of farmland and there,they grow wheat and barley on chalky-flint soil. They have all the updated machinery, ploughs,cultivators and combine harvesters and they use Bunns 9-24-24 fertilizer.They sell their corn to a corn merchant. There are{pigs,beef cattle and dogs on the farm.The pigs are housed,but the cattle are outside all the time. The pigs are bred here and are the most important feature on the farm.The animals are sold for meat at a local market. The workers are provided cottages near the farm and their families will carry on there after them.The farm spends{60-70 thousand pounds}a year.
